text: Dylan Bruce (born April 21, 1980) is a Canadian actor. He is best known for his roles as Chris Hughes on the CBS daytime soap opera As the World Turns and Paul Dierden on the BBC America/Space science fiction series Orphan Black. He has also had small roles in Passions, Joey, Las Vegas, CSI: NY and The Sopranos. Bruce was born in Vancouver, British Columbia. He grew up in Boundary Bay. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors
title: Dylan Bruce
